snippet.title: Supermodel Kendall Jenner stuns in braless lingerie shoot for La Perla
snippet.content:
Kendall Jenner & Bella Hadid HOOKING UP!? 1:54
Is the relationship between Bella Hadid and Kendall Jenner MORE than just friends?!?! Are the lovely ladies hooking up? New reports say so, but is it true?? Did you ever think that Bella and Kendall could actually be involved with one another on a different level??
July 28th 2017 5 days ago /display/newscorpaustralia.com/Web/NewsNetwork/Entertainment - syndicated/
kendall Jenner has posed in a G-string (and nothing else) for La Perla. Picture: Gotham/GC Images
Nadia SalemmeNews Corp Australia Network
Share
KENDALL Jenner has posed topless for her latest a lingerie campaign - wearing only a pair of red lace knickers. The Victoria's Secret model is pictured braless and wearing a G-string in her new La Perla campaign. It's the latest in a long line of sexy shoots for the Keeping Up With the Kardashians star, 21. This week, wore Sydney-based label Bec and Bridge in New York, sans bra, while out in Soho with her BFF, Bella Hadid.
KENDALL'S NEW CAMPAIGN
Jenner has spoken previously about when she just doesn't feel the need to wear a bra, saying she "really just doesn't care". She has previously said she hates wearing a bra because "I'm not embarrassed by my body". "I really don't see what the big deal is with going braless!," Jenner wrote on her blog last year, in a post titled "Free The Nipple".
She was pictured braless wearing Australian-based designer Bec and Bridge in New York this week. Picture: Gotham/GC ImagesSource:Getty Images "It's sexy, it's comfortable and I'm cool with my breasts. That's it!" Jenner said. "It's also a fun way to show off my different nipple rings! I think it's cool and I really just don't care."
She famously wore a see-through dress by La Perla to the Met Ball in May.
Kendall Jenner's naked dress. Picture: Getty ImagesSource:Getty Images
